A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Very lazy writing! Completely went against the spirit of Star Wars. Although the dialogue in the prequels was lacking\, their story was solid and well thought out. JJ Abrams has a very difficult task of making sense in Episode 9. Rian Johnson basically made the Skywalker line as evil. After 40 years of loving this franchise\, I doubt I watch another Kathleen Kennedy produced Star Wars.
